item.title: Creating Organisations
item.description: __ PSA - Today’s blog is a lot of feelings. Apologies if it doesn’t make any sense. In yesterday’s blog I briefly touched upon the fundamental flaw of any institution in a capitalistic structure. No matter how hard you try to stick to your principles, working in a society that incentivizes constant production over mindful interactions is always a challenge. What I am not doing today is discussing how to build an organisation without compromising on an individuals or principles, I have absolutely no experience in that area.
